title: Zinnia is Hiring Interns Only from Batch 2026 to be converted to Full Time Role Based on Performance during 06 months Internships from January 2026 to June 2026-Students shortlisted For Virtual Online Assessment on 20 August at 10.30 AM
content:
Below mentioned students have been shortlisted by the company to appear for the online assessment at 10.30 AM on 20 August 2025.

 

Few Instructions for students while attempting the Online Test:

  • The company will directly send them the Test Link (via HackerEarth) on the specified Date & Time on their email IDs.
  • Please avoid taking the test on Mobile Phone & only attempt using Laptop/Desktop with their webcam “ON”.
  • The test would be based on Coding/General Aptitude.
  • It will be a highly proctored test, please avoid opening any other tabs or switching tabs in the browser. Otherwise, it might close automatically.
  • Students should attempt the test where they have a good & stable internet connectivity.

 
The company will visit JIIT Noida Main campus for Campus Drive (Pre-placement Talk & Technical Interviews) for shortlisted Candidates in the Online Test on 25th August.

title: SAP Labs - Full Time Role Hiring -  Technical interview shortlist - report by 8 Am, 18 Aug - IMP
content:
Batch 2026 Students shortlisted for SAP Labs: Campus interviews on 18 Aug 2025.

 

Venue and Date published for Stage 4 (Technical interview) of SAP Labs's Technical/Development Consultant

 

Stage 4 (Technical interview) of SAP Labs's Technical/Development Consultant

  • Venue: T&P Hall, 2nd Floor, ABB-1, JIIT Main Campus
  • Timing: August, 18, 08:00 AM IST to August, 18, 07:00 PM IST

Note: Students will be properly dressed in college uniform with neck-tie for the activities pertaining to the placement drives, e.g., PPT, Test, GD, interviews, etc. No jeans will be worn. Students will put on black leather shoes and a belt.  Students are advised to take a bath on the day of the drive, put on a properly cleaned & ironed uniform, and look fresh. Hairs should be properly combed, and the beard properly trimmed. M.Tech. & M.Sc. students will be in business-formals, and no round-neck shirts will be worn.

Students are requested not to absent themselves from any stage of the placement drive/event, as it may invite disciplinary action.

Carry your ID card and two copies of your resume.

title: Open for applications - Mu Sigma's Job Profile - Trainee-Decision Scientist
content:
Applications are now being accepted for Mu Sigma's Job Profile: Trainee-Decision Scientist.

Eligible students will be able to find this job profile under JOB PROFILES options, and apply.

Applicable Courses

  1. B.Tech - CSE, JIIT
  2. B.Tech - IT, JIIT
  3. B.Tech - ECE, JIIT
  4. B.Tech - Biotechnology, JIIT

Eligibility

  1. B.Tech
    • Undergraduate - 7 CGPA
    • Class 12th - 70 PERCENT
    • Class 10th - 70 PERCENT
  2. No backlogs

Hiring Process - Stages

  1. Pre-placement Talk
  2. Resume shortlisting
  3. Written test
  4. Technical interview
  5. HR interview

Deadline for applications is August, 13, 11:00 AM .
author: Anurag Srivastava

title: SAP Labs - Full Time Role Hiring - Batch 2026 - Online Test - Imp Instructions (Laptop requirement)  - 13 Aug 2025
content:
Kind Attn: Batch 2026

SAP Labs – Campus Update

All shortlisted students will take the online test in the designated computer labs after the PPT.

  • Test Time: 11:00 AM on 13 August 2025 (Wednesday)
  • Venues:
    • MML (2nd Floor, ABB-I, Opp. T&P Cell)
    • CL1, CL2, CL4 (ABB-III, JIIT Main Campus, Sec-62, Noida)
  • Note: All students assigned to CL1 must carry their laptop, LAN cable, and adaptor to connect the LAN cable to the Laptop.

Attendance will be taken during both the PPT and the Online Test. Only students present in the auditorium for the PPT will be permitted to proceed with the online test.

title: Open for applications - Bain & Company's Job Profile - Associate-Healthcare and Life Science
content:
Applications are now being accepted for Bain & Company's Job Profile: Associate-Healthcare and Life Science.

Eligible students will be able to find this job profile under JOB PROFILES options, and apply.

Applicable Courses

  1. M.Tech (Integrated) - Biotechnology, JIIT
  2. B.Tech - Biotechnology, JIIT
  3. M.Tech. - Biotechnology, JIIT

Eligibility

  1. M.Tech.
    • Post Graduate - 6 CGPA
  2. M.Tech (Integrated)
    • Dual Degree - 6 CGPA
  3. B.Tech
    • Undergraduate - 6 CGPA
  4. No backlogs

Hiring Process - Stages

  1. Data Screening
  2. Registration at Cos. Link
  3. Technical interview

Deadline for applications is August, 12, 11:00 AM .

title: SAP Labs - Full Time Role Hiring - Batch 2025 - List of Students - PPT - 9:30 AM, 13 Aug 2025
content:
Kind Attn: Batch 2026

SAP Labs – Campus Update

All shortlisted students are required to attend the Pre-Placement Talk as per the details below:

  • Reporting Time:9:30 AM on 13 August 2025 (Wednesday)
  • Venue: Auditorium, ABB-II, JIIT Main Campus, Sec-62, Noida
  • Followed by: Online Test at 11:00 AM in the computer labs, computer lab details will be shared in the next mail.

Attendance will be taken during the PPT. Only students present in the auditorium will be permitted to proceed with the online test.

content:
Applications are now being accepted for Oracle India Private Limited's Job Profile: Associate Consultant.

Eligible students will be able to find this job profile under JOB PROFILES options, and apply.

Applicable Courses

  1. M.Tech (Integrated) - CSE, JIIT
  2. M.Tech. - CSE, JIIT
  3. M.Tech. - ECE, JIIT
  4. M.Tech (Integrated) - ECE, JIIT
  5. B.Tech - CSE, JIIT
  6. B.Tech - IT, JIIT
  7. B.Tech - ECE, JIIT

Eligibility

  1. M.Tech.
    • Post Graduate - 8 CGPA
  2. M.Tech (Integrated)
    • Dual Degree - 8 CGPA
  3. B.Tech
    • Undergraduate - 8 CGPA
  4. No backlogs

Hiring Process - Stages

  1. Resume shortlisting
  2. Online test
  3. Technical interview
  4. Technical interview
  5. HR interview

Deadline for applications is August, 07, 11:00 AM .

title: Vinsol-Stadium ‚Äì Batch 2026 ‚Äì Shortlisted Students ‚Äì Selection Process ‚Äì 9:40 AM, 05 Aug 2025
content:
Kind Attn. BTech, Integrated – CSE-IT-ECE Students of the 2026 batch

Selection Process Details: 

Two Online Test; Aptitude (60 minutes) Coding Test (60 Minutes), and Puzzle round (Pen & Paper).

Reporting Time & Date: 9:40 AM, 05 Aug 2025

Venue: CL1, CL2, CL4, ABB-III, JIIT, Main Campus (JIIT Sec-62)

Note: Students will be properly dressed in college uniform with a neck-tie for the activities pertaining to the placement drives, e.g., PPT, Test, GD, interviews, etc. No jeans will be worn. Students will put on black leather shoes and a belt.  Students are advised to take a bath on the day of the drive, put on a properly cleaned & ironed uniform, and look fresh. Hairs should be properly combed, and the beard properly trimmed. M.Tech. & M.Sc. students will be in business-formals, and no round-neck shirts will be worn.

 

Students are hereby cautioned not to indulge in unfair means while undertaking the placement drive test/interviews. Please do not talk to anyone or take help on cell phones or online or from peer groups. Students involved in such acts of cheating, if caught and communicated by the company, their offers will be revoked and disciplinary action initiated.

 

Students are requested not to absent themselves from any stage of the placement drive/event as it may invite disciplinary action.

 List of Students as announced, Hostelers can carry their Laptop and LAN cable.

 

All the best!

Anita Marwaha

title: Vinsol-Stadium ‚Äì Batch 2026 ‚Äì Shortlisted Students ‚Äì Selection Process ‚Äì 9:40 AM, 05 Aug 2025
content:
Kind Attn. BTech, Integrated – CSE-IT-ECE Students of the 2026 batch

Selection Process Details: Shortlist Already Announced (114 students)

Two Online Test; Aptitude (60 minutes) Coding Test (60 Minutes), and Puzzle round (Pen & Paper).

Reporting Time & Date: 9:40 AM, 05 Aug 2025

Venue: CL1, CL2, CL4, ABB-III, JIIT, Main Campus (JIIT Sec-62)

Note: Students will be properly dressed in college uniform with a neck-tie for the activities pertaining to the placement drives, e.g., PPT, Test, GD, interviews, etc. No jeans will be worn. Students will put on black leather shoes and a belt.  Students are advised to take a bath on the day of the drive, put on a properly cleaned & ironed uniform, and look fresh. Hairs should be properly combed, and the beard properly trimmed. M.Tech. & M.Sc. students will be in business-formals, and no round-neck shirts will be worn.

 

Students are hereby cautioned not to indulge in unfair means while undertaking the placement drive test/interviews. Please do not talk to anyone or take help on cell phones or online or from peer groups. Students involved in such acts of cheating, if caught and communicated by the company, their offers will be revoked and disciplinary action initiated.

 

Students are requested not to absent themselves from any stage of the placement drive/event as it may invite disciplinary action.

 List of Students: Hostelers can carry their Laptop and LAN cable.

title: Vinsol-Stadium ‚Äì Batch 2026 ‚Äì Shortlisted Students ‚Äì Selection Process ‚Äì 9:40 AM, 05 Aug 2025
content:
Kind Attn. BTech, Integrated – CSE-IT-ECE Students of the 2026 batch

Selection Process Details: Shortlist Already Announced (114 students)

Two Online Test; Aptitude (60 minutes) Coding Test (60 Minutes) and Puzzle round (Pen & Paper).

Reporting Time & Date: 9:40 AM, 05 Aug 2025

Venue: CL1, CL2, CL4, ABB-III, JIIT, Main Campus (JIIT Sec-62)

Note: Students will be properly dressed in college uniform with a neck-tie for the activities pertaining to the placement drives, e.g., PPT, Test, GD, interviews, etc. No jeans will be worn. Students will put on black leather shoes and a belt.  Students are advised to take a bath on the day of the drive, put on a properly cleaned & ironed uniform, and look fresh. Hairs should be properly combed, and the beard properly trimmed. M.Tech. & M.Sc. students will be in business-formals, and no round-neck shirts will be worn.

 

Students are hereby cautioned not to indulge in unfair means while undertaking the placement drive test/interviews. Please do not talk to anyone or take help on cell phones or online or from peer groups. Students involved in such acts of cheating, if caught and communicated by the company, their offers will be revoked and disciplinary action initiated.

 Shortlist already announced

Students are requested not to absent themselves from any stage of the placement drive/event as it may invite disciplinary action.

 

rgds,

Anita Marwaha

title: Bounteous x Accolite - Webinar on Topic "How Artificial Intelligence is transforming the technology landscape and what it means for their future careers" on 05 August, 2025 - Register soon.
content:
Bounteous x Accolite - Webinar on Topic " how Artificial Intelligence is transforming the technology landscape and what it means for their future careers" on 05 August, 2025 - Register soon.

 Kind attention: B.Tech, M.Tech and INTGT (All Branch Students), BCA, MCA, BSc - 2026 Bach 

Please find below the webinar details as received from the company Bounteous x Accolite

At Bounteous x Accolite, we're passionate about nurturing the next generation of IT innovators. As part of this commitment, we are pleased to invite your students to our upcoming webinar titled Shape Your IT Career for the AI Era, featuring Balaji Rajan, our Vice President of Technology.

This session is designed to help students understand how Artificial Intelligence is transforming the technology landscape and what it means for their future careers. They will gain: 

  • Insights into how AI is changing development practices and IT roles 

  • An understanding of the skills and mindset needed to stay relevant in this new AI-first environment 

  • Practical strategies to align their careers growth with evolving industry needs 

Click here to volunteer for the Webinar:  

(Apply by 05 Aug, 2025, 1 PM)

(https://app.joinsuperset.com//#/surveys/generic/0f72d62b-7517-45b0-ac74-a71944314aec/submit)

Webinar Details:
Date: Tuesday, August 5, 2025
Time: 5:00 PM – 6:00 PM IST

Company Registration Link for Webinar: https://bounteous.zoom.us/webinar/register/7817537708970/WN_1hHaJl4jScyX9lwl2f6khA

Speaker: Balaji Rajan, Vice President, Technology, Bounteous x Accolite : Balaji is a seasoned technology leader and change management expert and brings over 25 years of experience helping organizations adopt emerging technologies and deliver outcomes aligned with business priorities.

Thanks & Regards
Vinod Kumar
Sr. Officer - T & P
JIIT, Noida

title: Open for applications - Vinsol Stadium's Job Profile - Software Engineer Trainee
content:
Applications are now being accepted for Vinsol Stadium's Job Profile: Software Engineer Trainee.

Eligible students will be able to find this job profile under JOB PROFILES options, and apply.

Applicable Courses

  1. B.Tech - CSE, JIIT
  2. B.Tech - IT, JIIT
  3. M.Tech (Integrated) - CSE, JIIT
  4. M.Tech (Integrated) - ECE, JIIT
  5. B.Tech - ECE, JIIT

Eligibility

  1. M.Tech (Integrated)
    • Class 10th - 70 PERCENT
    • Dual Degree - 7 CGPA
    • Class 12th - 70 PERCENT
  2. B.Tech
    • Class 10th - 70 PERCENT
    • Undergraduate - 7 CGPA
    • Class 12th - 70 PERCENT
  3. No backlogs

Hiring Process - Stages

  1. Data Screening
  2. Aptitude Test
  3. Coding Test
  4. Puzzle Round
  5. Technical Interview 1
  6. Culture Fit & Offer

Deadline for applications is August, 04, 05:00 PM .

All bonuses are entirely performance-based and at the sole discretion of the company.
The performance bonus cycle begins once your training is successfully completed.
Your performance during the training period will also be considered during the evaluation process.
)

**Eligibility Criteria:**
- **Courses:** B.Tech - CSE, B.Tech - ECE, B.Tech - IT, M.Tech (Integrated) - CSE, M.Tech (Integrated) - ECE
- **UG Marks:** 7.0 CGPA or equivalent
- **CLASS_XII Marks:** 70.0 CGPA or equivalent
- **CLASS_X Marks:** 70.0 CGPA or equivalent

**Hiring Flow:**
1. Data Screening
2. Aptitude Test
3. Coding Test
4. Puzzle Round
5. Technical Interview 1
6. Culture Fit & Offer

‚ö†Ô∏è **Deadline:** August 04, 2025, 05:00 PM

title: Open for applications - Oracle Financial Services Software Limited (OFSS)'s Job Profile - Associate Consultant
content:
Applications are now being accepted for Oracle Financial Services Software Limited (OFSS)'s Job Profile: Associate Consultant.

Eligible students will be able to find this job profile under JOB PROFILES options, and apply.

Applicable Courses

  1. M.Tech. - CSE, JIIT
  2. M.Tech. - ECE, JIIT
  3. B.Tech - CSE, JIIT
  4. B.Tech - IT, JIIT
  5. B.Tech - ECE, JIIT
  6. M.Tech (Integrated) - ECE, JIIT
  7. M.Tech (Integrated) - CSE, JIIT
  8. MCA (2 Year) - MCA, JIIT

Eligibility

  1. M.Tech.
    • Post Graduate - 7 CGPA
  2. M.Tech (Integrated)
    • Post Graduate - 7 CGPA
  3. B.Tech
    • Undergraduate - 7 CGPA
  4. MCA (2 Year)
    • Post Graduate - 7 CGPA
  5. No backlogs

Hiring Process - Stages

  1. Resume shortlisting
  2. Online test
  3. Technical interview
  4. Technical interview
  5. HR interview

Deadline for applications is August, 01, 05:00 PM .

title: Cadera Infotech ‚Äì Batch 2026 ‚Äì List of students ‚Äì Online Test - 10:45 AM, 31 July 2025
content:
Reporting time: 10:45 AM, 31 July 2025

Venue: CL1, CL2, ABB-III, JIIT Main Campus (Sec-62) Noida

Carry your ID Card.

It is mandatory to take the tests from the computer labs only.

Note: Students will be properly dressed in college uniform with neck-tie for the activities pertaining to the placement drives, e.g., PPT, Test, GD, interviews, etc. No jeans will be worn. Students will put on black leather shoes and a belt.  Students are advised to take a bath on the day of the drive, put on a properly cleaned & ironed uniform, and look fresh. Hairs should be properly combed, and the beard properly trimmed.

Students are hereby cautioned not to indulge in unfair means while undertaking the placement drive test/interviews. Please do not talk to anyone or take help on cell phones or online or from peer groups. Students involved in such acts of cheating, if caught and reported by the company, their offers will be revoked and disciplinary action initiated.

 

Students are requested not to absent themselves from any stage of the placement drive/event as it may invite disciplinary action.

List of students eligible for Online Assessments:

title: JTG - Shortlist for FE role - Online test FE Role -10:45 AM, 30 July 2025
content:
The following students are eligible for the Front End Developer Role - Online Test of JTG

Reporting time: 10:45 AM, 30 July 2025

Venue: CL1, CL2,  ABB-III, JIIT Main Campus (Sec-62) Noida

Carry your ID Card.

There are two tests, one after another, and it is mandatory to take the tests from the computer labs only.

Note: Students will be properly dressed in college uniform with neck-tie for the activities pertaining to the placement drives, e.g., PPT, Test, GD, interviews, etc. No jeans will be worn. Students will put on black leather shoes and a belt.  Students are advised to take a bath on the day of the drive, put on a properly cleaned & ironed uniform, and look fresh. Hairs should be properly combed, and the beard properly trimmed. M.Tech. & M.Sc. students will be in business-formals, and no round-neck shirts will be worn.
 
Students are hereby cautioned not to indulge in unfair means while undertaking the placement drive test/interviews. Please do not talk to anyone or take help on cell phones or online or from peer groups. Students involved in such acts of cheating, if caught and communicated by the company, their offers will be revoked and disciplinary action initiated.
 
Students are requested not to absent themselves from any stage of the placement drive/event as it may invite disciplinary action.
 

List of students for FE Test. Integrated, MTech, and MCA students are requested to carry their Laptops and headsets.

**JTG - Shortlist for FE role - Online test FE Role -10:45 AM, 30 July 2025**

**üîî [shortlisting]**

The following students are eligible for the Front End Developer Role - Online Test of JTG
Reporting time:
10:45 AM, 30 July 2025
Venue
: CL1, CL2,¬† ABB-III, JIIT Main Campus (Sec-62) Noida
Carry your ID Card.
There are two tests, one after another, and it is mandatory to take the tests from the computer labs only.
Note:¬†Students will be properly¬†dressed¬†in college uniform with neck-tie for the activities pertaining to the placement drives, e.g., PPT,¬†Test, GD, interviews, etc. No jeans will be worn. Students will put on black leather shoes and a¬†belt.
Students are advised to take a bath¬†on the day of the drive, put on a properly cleaned & ironed uniform, and look fresh. Hairs should be properly combed, and the beard properly trimmed. M.Tech. & M.Sc. students will be in business-formals, and no round-neck shirts will be worn.
Students are hereby cautioned not to indulge in unfair means while undertaking the placement drive¬†test
/interviews.
Please do not talk to anyone or take help on cell phones or¬†online¬†or from peer groups. Students involved in such acts of cheating, if caught and communicated by the company, their offers will be revoked and disciplinary action initiated.
Students are requested not to absent themselves¬†from any¬†stage of the placement drive/event as it may invite disciplinary action.
List of students for FE Test. Integrated, MTech, and MCA students are requested to carry their Laptops and headsets.

title: JTG - Batch 2026 - Final list of student Front End Role Online Test -  10:45 AM, 30 July 2025
content:
The following students are eligible for the Front End Developer Role - Online Test

Reporting time: 10:45 AM, 30 July 2025

Venue: CL1, CL2,  ABB-III, JIIT Main Campus (Sec-62) Noida

Carry your ID Card.

There are two tests, one after another, and it is mandatory to take the tests from the computer labs only.

Note: Students will be properly dressed in college uniform with neck-tie for the activities pertaining to the placement drives, e.g., PPT, Test, GD, interviews, etc. No jeans will be worn. Students will put on black leather shoes and a belt.  Students are advised to take a bath on the day of the drive, put on a properly cleaned & ironed uniform, and look fresh. Hairs should be properly combed, and the beard properly trimmed. M.Tech. & M.Sc. students will be in business-formals, and no round-neck shirts will be worn.
 
Students are hereby cautioned not to indulge in unfair means while undertaking the placement drive test/interviews. Please do not talk to anyone or take help on cell phones or online or from peer groups. Students involved in such acts of cheating, if caught and reported by the company, their offers will be revoked and disciplinary action initiated.
 
Students are requested not to absent themselves from any stage of the placement drive/event as it may invite disciplinary action.

List of students for FE Test. Integrated, MTech, and MCA students are requested to carry their Laptops and headsets.

title: Bounteous x Accolite - Webinar on Topic "  how Artificial Intelligence is transforming the technology landscape and what it means for their future careers" on  05 August, 2025 - Register soon.
content:
Kind attention: B.Tech, M.Tech and INTGT (All Branch Students) - 2026 Batch

 

Please find below the webinar details as received from the company Bounteous x Accolite

At Bounteous x Accolite, we're passionate about nurturing the next generation of IT innovators. As part of this commitment, we are pleased to invite your students to our upcoming webinar titled Shape Your IT Career for the AI Era, featuring Balaji Rajan, our Vice President of Technology.

This session is designed to help students understand how Artificial Intelligence is transforming the technology landscape and what it means for their future careers. They will gain:

 

  • Insights into how AI is changing development practices and IT roles 

  • An understanding of the skills and mindset needed to stay relevant in this new AI-first environment 

  • Practical strategies to align their careers growth with evolving industry needs 

Click here to volunteer for the Webinar:

(https://app.joinsuperset.com//#/surveys/generic/0f72d62b-7517-45b0-ac74-a71944314aec/submit)

Webinar Details:
Date: Tuesday, August 5, 2025
Time: 5:00 PM – 6:00 PM IST

Registration Link for Webinar: https://bounteous.zoom.us/webinar/register/7817537708970/WN_1hHaJl4jScyX9lwl2f6khA

Speaker: Balaji Rajan, Vice President, Technology, Bounteous x Accolite : Balaji is a seasoned technology leader and change management expert and brings over 25 years of experience helping organizations adopt emerging technologies and deliver outcomes aligned with business priorities.

 

Thanks & Regards

Vinod Kumar

Sr. Officer - T & P

JIIT, Noida

Please note that new deadline for applications is July, 26, 01:40 PM IST


If you have not applied already, please apply before deadline expires.
author: Archita Kumar
package_breakdown:
(
Salary Package Details :
Stipend during Internship: INR 20,000 per month
Salary Package upon Full Time conversion: INR 6.0 LPA - INR 10.20 LPA (Conversion to full-time role based on performance during Internship and the then prevailing market conditions)
Retention Bonus : INR 50,000 after 18 months of service
)
formatted_message:
**Deadline for Applications changed - Cadera Infotech Private Limited's Job Profile - IT Developer Trainee**

**üì¢ Job Posting**
**Company:** Cadera Infotech Private Limited
**Role:** IT Developer Trainee
**CTC:** 6.00 LPA (
Salary Package Details :
Stipend during Internship: INR 20,000 per month
Salary Package upon Full Time conversion: INR 6.0 LPA - INR 10.20 LPA (Conversion to full-time role based on performance during Internship and the then prevailing market conditions)
Retention Bonus : INR 50,000 after 18 months of service
)

**Eligibility Criteria:**
- **Courses:** B.Tech - CSE, B.Tech - IT, B.Tech - ECE
- **UG Marks:** 6.0 CGPA or equivalent

**Hiring Flow:**
1. Resume Shortlist
2. Aptitude & Coding Assessment
3. Technical interview
4. Final HR Round

‚ö†Ô∏è **Deadline:** July 26, 2025, 01:40 PM

Kind Attn. BTech, Ingt, MTech - CSE-IT-ECE 2026 Batch Students

 

JTG Campus: Campus Update

Online Test for Software Developer Role

Date: 28 July 2025, Reporting time 10:45 AM

Test time from 11 am to 5 pm

Venue: CL1, CL2, CL3, ABB-III, JIIT Main Campus (Sec-62) Noida

There are three tests, one after another, and it is mandatory to take the tests from the computer labs only.

title: Conglomerate IT -Hiring Interns Only From Batch 2026-To be Converted to Full Time Role Based on Performance During Internship From August 2025 to July 2026-Updated NCET Test Link-Mandatory to attempt by 9 PM on 28 July
content:
Dear students,

Please find the details and process for NCET. The deadline to attempt this test is 9 PM on 28 July.

The test link is active, you are advised to attempt the test without any delay.

For any assistance, candidates can directly connect with the support team via JIVO Support, available on the test dashboard.

 

Test Link - https://match.myanatomy.in/shortened/66c8376a59b583177d527ccd

 

Step to Start NCET Test

*Step 1:* Register using the given link Create MATCH Profile. If already registered, click on "Already have an account" and verify via OTP.

*Step 2:* Upload your resume.(Please don't Skip)

*Step 3:* Complete your profile. Basic details, Educational details, Personal details and career aspirations are mandatory.

*Step 4:* Once the mandatory details are completed, click on "Start Journey."The rest of the details you can fill in later

*Step 5:* Next, click on "Dashboard," which is visible on the left side panel.

*Step 6:* On the dashboard, scroll down and click on "Start New Attempt."

 

Candidate Requirements & Guidelines

Technical Requirements:

  1. a) A functional computer system with seamless internet connectivity.
    b) Windows operating system (No other operating system is supported).
    c) Minimum 1 Mbps internet speed per PC.
    d) An updated Google Chrome or Mozilla Firefox browser (latest version); Note:Internet Explorer is not supported.
    e) A webcam is mandatoryto take the test.

Do’s for Candidates:

  1. a) Candidates should have access to their email ID.
    b) Candidates must have a soft copy of their CV to upload (Mandatory).
    c) Candidates should fill in all academic details correctly.
    d) Before starting the test, candidates should ensure that their computer is connected to high-speed internet and meets all the technical requirements mentioned.
    e) Once the test begins, it is recommended to complete it in one go for the entire duration.

Don’ts for Candidates:

  1. a) Candidates should not move or navigate outside the test window, as they will be marked suspicious. Repeated attempts to do so may result in test termination.
    b) Candidates are not allowed to use mobile phones or calculators during the test.
    c) The webcam must remain ONon the PC/Laptop throughout the test.
    d) The test is monitored and has strong proctoring mechanisms; hence, candidates are advised not to engage in any form of cheating.

 

Anurag Srivastava

title: Conglomerate IT -Hiring Interns Only From Batch 2026-To be Converted to Full Time Role Based on Performance During Internship From August 2025 to July 2026-NCET Test Link-Mandatory to attempt by 9 PM on 28 July
content:
Dear students,

Please find the details and process for NCET. The deadline to attempt this test is 9 PM on 28 July.

The test link is active, you are advised to attempt the test without any delay.

For any assistance, candidates can directly connect with the support team via JIVO Support, available on the test dashboard.

 

Test Link - https://match.myanatomy.in/shortened/66c8376859b583177d5270ce

 

Step to Start NCET Test

*Step 1:* Register using the given link Create MATCH Profile. If already registered, click on "Already have an account" and verify via OTP.

*Step 2:* Upload your resume.(Please don't Skip)

*Step 3:* Complete your profile. Basic details, Educational details, Personal details and career aspirations are mandatory.

*Step 4:* Once the mandatory details are completed, click on "Start Journey."The rest of the details you can fill in later

*Step 5:* Next, click on "Dashboard," which is visible on the left side panel.

*Step 6:* On the dashboard, scroll down and click on "Start New Attempt."

 

Candidate Requirements & Guidelines

Technical Requirements:

  1. a) A functional computer system with seamless internet connectivity.
    b) Windows operating system (No other operating system is supported).
    c) Minimum 1 Mbps internet speed per PC.
    d) An updated Google Chrome or Mozilla Firefox browser (latest version); Note:Internet Explorer is not supported.
    e) A webcam is mandatoryto take the test.

Do’s for Candidates:

  1. a) Candidates should have access to their email ID.
    b) Candidates must have a soft copy of their CV to upload (Mandatory).
    c) Candidates should fill in all academic details correctly.
    d) Before starting the test, candidates should ensure that their computer is connected to high-speed internet and meets all the technical requirements mentioned.
    e) Once the test begins, it is recommended to complete it in one go for the entire duration.

Don’ts for Candidates:

  1. a) Candidates should not move or navigate outside the test window, as they will be marked suspicious. Repeated attempts to do so may result in test termination.
    b) Candidates are not allowed to use mobile phones or calculators during the test.
    c) The webcam must remain ONon the PC/Laptop throughout the test.
    d) The test is monitored and has strong proctoring mechanisms; hence, candidates are advised not to engage in any form of cheating.

 

Anurag Srivastava

title: Internshala off campus - Big Brands Hiring Drive for 2026 Batch Students - Apply by 5:00 PM, 23 July, 2025
content:
Kind attention: All Branch students of BTech, MTech, INTGT, MSc, BSc, BCA & MCA 2026 Batch Students

Please find below the details as received from Internshala:

We wanted to inform you about our newly launched initiative – Big brands hiring drive 2025. This campaign offers premium openings at top brands like Swiggy, Blinkit, Jio and many more.

This hiring drive come with:
1.        Salary packages up to INR 25 Lakh
2.        Receive top jobs in your inbox
3.        Easy access to 30,000+ job openings in Top-notch companies.

Interested students may volunteer through the below given link.

https://app.joinsuperset.com//#/surveys/generic/16d64579-8d93-4aaf-b0cb-406744052476/submit

After doing registration on the above link please apply for the opportunity at the Internshala reg. link.

Application link: internshala.com/i/bigbrandshiringdrive-db

Though the Last date to apply on the above link is 31st July 2025 but please do not wait for the last hours and complete registration by 5:00 PM, 23 July, 2025.

Important Guidelines Given by Internshala:

1. Make an impressive resume with an embedded colour passport photograph, give the filename as "<Roll No> space < Your Name>" and then upload in the PDF format only.

2. There would be short-listing  before the process from the datasheet and resumes.

Register soon, don't miss out on the opportunity.

 

Thanks & Regards

Vinod Kumar
Sr. Officer - T & P
JIIT, Noida

title: L'Or√©al Sustainability Challenge 2025 : Hiring Challenge For Engineering Students Batch ‚Äì 2026 ‚Äì apply by 03 PM, 19 July 2025
content:
Kind attention: BTech, Ingt, MTech students of the 2026 Batch

 

L'Oréal Sustainability Challenge 2025: Beauty for the Planet, Progress for All.

 

Launching its 9th edition, L'Oréal is back with the Sustainability Challenge 2025. It is an all-Digital Challenge that resonates with L’Oréal’s sustainability program.

 

This year L’Oréal Sustainability Challenge will be focusing on the PEOPLE, PLANET & PRODUCT pillars. They want to create long-term and sustainable impact and to achieve this, They want young and passionate change agents like you, to contribute to a better and more sustainable planet, while also creating a community of our consumers and supporters who can take this journey with them.

 

Exciting Prizes:

 

 

For final-year undergraduate students, the salary package will be role-specific and shared during the PPI process

 

Pre-Placement Interviews for National Finalists and Semi-Finalists

 

Win exclusive L’Oréal hampers as a reward for all National Finalists

 

Participation: Interested and willing students to participate.

 

Team Rules:

A team must consist of exactly 3 members.

Each member has to register with official college email IDs.

Cross-specialization & cross-college teams are eligible.

Cross-year teams are not eligible.

A student cannot be a part of more than one team.

Any deviation from the above will result in immediate disqualification of the entire team.

Modification of team post registration will not be allowed.

 

Registration:

 

All interested students in the final year must register their team by 03 PM, 19th July.

 

Click here to Participate L'Oréal Sustainability Challenge 2025

 

 

The registration links for the L'Oréal Sustainability Challenge 2025 will be shared with the team members after they confirm their willingness to participate.

 

All the Best

title: The Lam Research Challenge 2025 -  Hackathon Link shared - Apply by 11 AM, 20 July 2025
content:
Kind Attn. BTech, Intg, MTech -ECE & VLSI students of the 2026 Batch

 Systems Engineering Challenge for Core Engineering Students – The Lam Research Challenge 2025

 

Mandatory Link to register and participate in the hackathon, ECE students register for the challenge by 11 AM, 20 July 2025

 

 Lam Research Challenge 2025 <https://lrc2025.tworks.in/>

You can view full event details, competition structure, and timelines here


→ Click Here <https://lrc2025.tworks.in/>
Register Now <https://lrc2025.tworks.in/register?ref=LRC25-TW-HACK-CULTUR>

 India’s premier systems engineering make-a-thon, organized by *HackCulture* in
collaboration with *T-Works* and *Lam Research*.

 

This competition is especially relevant for students from *ECE & VLSI, Mechanical, Mechatronics, Electrical, and Robotics* backgrounds.

 

It offers hands-on exposure to solving real-world, multidisciplinary challenges

through simulation, automation, and hardware prototyping.

 

Key Highlights:

   - Cash prizes worth 10,00,000

  - Tailored for Mechanical, Electrical, and core engineering branches

  - Internship & job opportunities with Lam Research

  - Mentorship from industry experts

  - Hands-on learning with simulation tools & hardware kits

 

Finalists will compete on-ground at the Grand Finale in Bengaluru.

 

All the Best!

Anita Marwaha

title: The Lam Research Challenge 2025 - Apply by 11 AM, 18 July 2025
content:
Kind Attn. BTech, Intg, MTech -ECE & VLSI students of the 2026 Batch

 

Systems Engineering Challenge for Core Engineering Students – The Lam Research Challenge 2025

 

India’s premier Systems Engineering make-a-thon, organized by *HackCulture* in

collaboration with *T-Works* and *Lam Research*.

 

This competition is especially relevant for students from *ECE & VLSI, Mechanical, Mechatronics, Electrical, and Robotics* backgrounds.

 

It offers hands-on exposure to solving real-world, multidisciplinary challenges

through simulation, automation, and hardware prototyping.

 

ECE students register for the challenge by 11 AM, 18 July 2025

 

Click here for The LAM Research Challenge

 

Key Highlights:

   - Cash prizes worth 10,00,000

  - Tailored for Mechanical, Electrical, and core engineering branches

  - Internship & job opportunities with Lam Research

  - Mentorship from industry experts

  - Hands-on learning with simulation tools & hardware kits

 

Finalists will compete on-ground at the Grand Finale in Bengaluru.

 

 

All the Best!

Anita Marwaha

title: Sprinklr's Cloud Engineer -  Online Test:  Be ready by 3:45 PM, 15 July 2025
content:
Dear Student,

 

You have been shortlisted for the online test. 

test links have been shared with students on the email ids of eligible students. The test window is for 15 minutes so the students won't be able to attempt the test after 4:15 PM. Please convey the same to the students.

 

Message for all shortlisted students from Sprinklr – hiring team

Thank you for your application for the role of Intern at Sprinklr. We appreciate your interest in our organization. As we are scheduling the coding test through HackerEarth on 16th July 2025. 

 

 Please follow the Smart browser help article along with the attached test guidelines for the test process while the test links are already shared with you via HackerEarth. 

 

All the students are supposed to have the HackerEarth account and a smart browser in advance to avoid last-minute login issues.  

 

Additionally, the student's system must support one of the following browser versions to attempt the test- 

 

Chrome: Version 41 & above 

Mozilla Firefox: Version 35 & above 

Internet Explorer: Version 11 

Safari: Version 11 & above 

Opera: Version 11 & above 

Edge: Version 41 

 

Pls find attached the test guidelines

content:

We’re happy to extend an invitation to your students for an online guest lecture led by a Subject Matter Expert from LTIMindtree. This interactive session aims to provide valuable perspectives on emerging technology trends and real-world applications.

 

We would truly appreciate your continued encouragement in driving active student participation. We look forward to an enriching exchange of ideas.

Vinod Kumar

title: Flipr Hackathon - Solve Real Company Challenges / Get Internships & Placements - Apply by 10 AM, 16 July, 2025
content:
Kind attention: B.Tech, M.Tech, INTGT (All Branch Students) 2026 BatchPlease find below the details as received from Flipr.We’re excited to invite students to Flipr Hackathon 28—a 72-hour online coding challenge where you’ll tackle a real-world problem provided by an actual company.Yes you read that right—this isn’t just another hackathon. You’ll be solving an actual company problem, giving you hands-on experience that truly matters.

Apart from this the top performers stand a chance to win internships/placement opportunities and cash prizes.

Whether you're into Gen Ai: Agentic Bots or Full Stack Web Development, this is your chance to shine. The problem statement will be revealed at the start of the hackathon!

Key Details

  • Streams: ML/AI | Full Stack Web Development 

  • Start: Friday, 25th July 2025, 4:00 PM

  • End: Monday, 28th July 2025, 4:00 PM

  • Mode: 100% Online (Participate from anywhere!)

  • Eligibility: Open to all engineering students (1st to 5th year)

  • Team Size: Up to 4 members


Why Participate?

  • Solve actual company problem 

  • Placement & Internship Opportunities to top performers

  • Merit Certificates for winners + Participation Certificates for all valid submissions

  • Cash Prizes

  • Mentorship from Industry Experts

  • Networking with top tech professionals

Vvolunteer to participate in the Hackathon through the link given below by 10 AM, 16 July, 2025:

https://app.joinsuperset.com//#/surveys/generic/c590bfbd-3fd1-46fb-bc54-167521c62dd8/submit

After volunteering at the above given link, please complete the registration process through the below given links before 25th July 2025, 3:00 PM.

  • Gen Ai: Agentic Bots 

  • Fullstack Web Development Hackathon Registration Link

The official hackathon poster is attached for your reference.

Looking forward to your participation in this high-energy, innovation-driven challenge. Let’s build something amazing together!

 

Thanks & Regards

Vinod Kumar

Sr. Officer - T & P

JIIT, Noida

title: Open for applications - Procol's Job Profile - Intern
content:
Applications are now being accepted for Procol's Job Profile: Intern.

Eligible students will be able to find this job profile under JOB PROFILES options, and apply.

Applicable Courses

  1. B.Tech - CSE, JIIT
  2. B.Tech - IT, JIIT
  3. M.Tech (Integrated) - CSE, JIIT

Eligibility

  1. M.Tech (Integrated)
    • Dual Degree - 8.5 CGPA
  2. B.Tech
    • Undergraduate - 8.5 CGPA
  3. No backlogs

Hiring Process - Stages

  1. Resume shortlisting
  2. Online test
  3. Technical interview
  4. Technical interview
  5. HR interview

Deadline for applications is July, 16, 10:00 AM .

title: ION Group- Hiring For FT Role From Batch 2026- To Join As Trainee From Jan 2026 Prior to Joining in Full Time Role-Online Test AT 3  PM on 15 July
content:
Kind attention to the aspirants of ION Group- Hiring For FT Role From Batch 2026- To Join As Trainee From Jan 2026 Prior to Joining in Full Time Role:

Students whose names are already published have been shortlisted to appear for the Online Test scheduled on 15th July 2025 (Tue) at 3:00 PM as part of ION's recruitment process.

 

These candidates are requested to ensure their availability for the test. The test link and further instructions will be shared with the students directly via email prior to the scheduled time.

 

Important Instructions for Candidates:

 

  1. Test Link: The test link will be sent by HackerRank to the candidate’s registered email. Please check the Spam/Junk folder if it’s not visible in the inbox.  The link should only be opened at the scheduled test time as it is valid for one-time use only. Make sure that the candidates are starting the test on time.
  2. We strongly recommend that you invite the students to the college for the online test and they take the test under your surveillance to avoid cheating.
  3. Any form of cheating will lead to immediate disqualification from the recruitment process.
  4. Students must keep their camera turned on throughout the test duration. 
  5. We kindly request that students adhere to the scheduled interview timings, as we will be unable to accommodate any rescheduling requests.


Candidates who clear the online assessment will move to the interview stage details below :   

  - Round 1&2: Conducted online 

  - Final Rounds (ION Day) at ION’s Noida Office

title: Open for applications - Mastercard's Job Profile - Software Engineer I
content:
Applications are now being accepted for Mastercard's Job Profile: Software Engineer I.

Eligible students will be able to find this job profile under JOB PROFILES options, and apply.

Applicable Courses

  1. B.Tech - CSE, JIIT
  2. B.Tech - IT, JIIT
  3. B.Tech - ECE, JIIT
  4. M.Tech (Integrated) - ECE, JIIT
  5. M.Tech (Integrated) - CSE, JIIT
  6. M.Tech. - CSE, JIIT
  7. M.Tech. - ECE, JIIT

Eligibility

  1. M.Tech.
    • Post Graduate - 6 CGPA
  2. M.Tech (Integrated)
    • Dual Degree - 6 CGPA
  3. B.Tech
    • Undergraduate - 6 CGPA
  4. No backlogs

Hiring Process - Stages

  1. Application and Screening
  2. Resume shortlisting
  3. Online test
  4. Technical interview
  5. HR/Behavioral Interview

Deadline for applications is July, 15, 10:00 AM .

title: Upcoming Event: Tata Technologies InnoVent 2026 - Join for a LinkedIn  Session on how to leverage AI for innovating solutions
content:
New Event Announcement!

Tata Technologies InnoVent 2026 - Join for a LinkedIn Session on how to leverage AI for innovating solutions

July, 15, 05:30 PM - July, 15, 10:30 PM

Kind attention: Aspirants of Tata Innovent Hackathon 
 
Please find below the details as received from Tata Innovent.
 
We are excited to invite students to an insightful LinkedIn Live 
session on AI/AI agents and how they can innovate winning projects for InnoVent 2026. 
 
Join our LinkedIn Live event on 15th July ’25 from 5:30 PM 
IST.
 
Here is the link:
Join us to learn how AI agents are shaping the future of smart mobility | LinkedIn
 
(https://www.linkedin.com/events/7348677451763302401/about/)
 
Our experts will showcase how AI agents and Agentic AI solutions 
are driving innovation and helping industries solve real-world challenges. 
 
Gain  valuable insights and get a head start on their journey in the InnoVent  2026 hackathon through this session.
 
We hope students are working on their  innovative project submissions for Tata Technologies InnoVent 2026. The 
last date for submission is 30th July 2026.
 
Thanks & Regards
Vinod Kumar
Sr. Officer - T & P
JIIT, Noida
 

You might be asked to mark your attendance for this event. To know how to mark your attendance, please read these instructions .
author: Vinod Kumar
package_breakdown:
(
CareEco Technologies Pvt Ltd is Hiring Interns Only from Batch 2026 to be converted to Full Time Role Based on Performance during 06 months Internships from July 2025 to December 2025.
This opportunity begins with an internship starting from July 2025 till December 2025, offering a stipend of INR 11,000 per month.
This will transition to a full-time position based on performance during the Internship and the then prevailing market conditions in January 2026 with a salary package of INR 11 LPA .
The breakup up of the  salary package is attached.
It will be a Virtual drive.
)

*Posted by*: Vinod Kumar

title: Watchguard Technologies - List of shortlisted students for Online Test scheduled on 26 July, 2025  from University Labs
content:
Kind attention: Aspirants of Watchguard Technologies campus drive - 2025 Batch
 
Note: Students will be properly dressed in college uniform with neck-tie for the activities pertaining to the placement drives e.g. PPT, Test, GD, interviews, etc. No jeans will be worn. Students will put-on black leather shoes and belts.  Students are advised to take bath on the day of the drive, put on a properly cleaned & ironed uniform, and look fresh. Hairs should be properly combed and  beard properly trimmed. M.Tech. & M.Sc. students will be in business-formals and no round-neck shirts will be worn.
 
Students are hereby cautioned not to indulge in unfair means while undertaking the placement drive test/virtual interviews. Please do not talk to anyone or take help on cell phones or on line or from peer-groups. Students involved in such acts of cheating, if caught and communicated by the company, their offers will be revoked and disciplinary action initiated.
 
Students are requested not to absent themselves from any stage of the placement drive/event as it may invite disciplinary action.
 
Shortlisting released for Watchguard Technologies campus drive.
 
Shortlisted students have to attend the online test as per the schedule below from the University Computer Labs.
 
Date: 26 July, 2025  (Saturday)
Reporting Time to the Computer Lab: 10:30 AM
Online Test Time: 11 AM to 12 PM (1 Hour)
Mode: Physically from Computer Labs only. Virtual Mode from home/virtual location is strictly not allowed.
 
Online Test Link/Password:  Online Test Link will be shared with the students by the company. Passwords will be shared in the Computer Labs by us.
 
Please note that the Online Assessment is to be attended from University Computer Labs Only. Attendance will be marked in the Computer Labs. *JUET, Guna students to contact Mr. Digvijay Chauhan; JUIT, Solan students to connect with Mr. Pankaj and JUA student to connect with Dr. Himanshu Rajput at respective universities for Computer Lab details of the Online Assessment.
 
Interviews of the shortlisted students will be planned on the dates 30th July, 31st July, Ist August and 2nd August, 2025 at JIIT, Noida. Please be available accordingly. We shall share the schedule soon after the Online Test Shortlisting release.
 
JUET, JUIT and JU - A shortlisted student from Online Test can avail the facility of Hostels at JIIT, Noida during the time of the campus drive.
 
 
Thanks & Regards
Vinod Kumar
Sr. Officer - T & P
JIIT, Noida

title: Open for applications - Ion Group's Job Profile - Software Developer / Technical Analyst / Data Science Analyst
content:
Applications are now being accepted for Ion Group's Job Profile: Software Developer / Technical Analyst / Data Science Analyst.

Eligible students will be able to find this job profile under JOB PROFILES options, and apply.

Applicable Courses

  1. B.Tech - CSE, JIIT
  2. B.Tech - IT, JIIT
  3. B.Tech - ECE, JIIT

Eligibility

  1. M.Tech.
    • Post Graduate - 7 CGPA
    • Undergraduate - 70 PERCENT
    • Class 12th - 70 PERCENT
    • Class 10th - 70 PERCENT
  2. M.Tech (Integrated)
    • Class 10th - 70 PERCENT
    • Class 12th - 70 PERCENT
    • Dual Degree - 7 CGPA
  3. B.Tech
    • Class 12th - 75 PERCENT
    • Undergraduate - 7.5 CGPA
    • Class 10th - 75 PERCENT
  4. No backlogs

Hiring Process - Stages

  1. Pre-placement Talk
  2. Resume shortlisting
  3. Aptitude and Role Specific Online Test
  4. Case Study Evaluation
  5. Stakeholder Evaluation
  6. Specific Skill Evaluation
  7. Psychometric Test
  8. Future Fit Evaluation ION Day
  9. HR interview

Deadline for applications is July, 13, 11:30 AM .
author: Anurag Srivastava

title: Tata Technologies InnoVent 2026 - Volunteer for the Hackathon by 30 June, 2025 - 9:30 AM
content:
Kind attention: B.Tech/M.Tech/INTGT (All Branch Students) of 2026 Passing out batch
 
We are excited to share the launch of Tata Technologies InnoVent 2026—our national innovation challenge created in partnership with AWS, aimed at empowering India’s engineering students to imagine and innovate what is next in mobility.

We are reaching out to you because your support plays a vital role in connecting us with bright 3rd and 4th year engineering students who are eager to make a real impact.

The theme for this year is Innovating the Future of Smart Mobility We're looking for bold, future-ready ideas that apply technologies like AI, Generative AI, Agentic AI, IoT, Embedded Software, Cloud Computing, Digital Twins, and AR/VR to solve challenges shaping the mobility sector. As part of the hackathon, we will train and mentor the students on innovation tolls and technologies as well help them scale their projects. Here is why you should share this opportunity with your students and urge them to participate:

·       Cumulative cash prizes worth 4.5 Lakhs for top teams
·       Special Recognition – Best Breakthrough Idea, Best Physical Prototype
·       Training & Mentorship with SMEs from Tata Technologies & AWS
·       Access to AWS tools for scaling shortlisted projects.
·       Paid internship opportunities with Tata Technologies for top teams

We will support participants with hands-on training in innovation tools and real-world guidance from our industry experts to help scale their ideas.

For more information on eligibility criteria, contest themes, and more, visit Tata Technologies InnoVent. 

Join our Briefing session on June 30 at 4:30 PM IST to learn more about eligibility, themes, and the journey ahead. We’ve also created a social media post announcing the launch.

Volunteer for the Tata invoent through the below given link:

https://app.joinsuperset.com//#/surveys/generic/6fcf4fe4-0e5c-44d1-904b-959e0abfa58c/submit
 
After volunteering through the above given link, please complete the registration for the Tata Innovent Hackathon through the below given link/url:

Innovent - Tata Technologies
 (https://www.tatatechnologies.com/in/innovent/)

 

 

 

Thanks & Regards

Vinod Kumar

Sr. Officer - T & P

JIIT, Noida

(

This will transition to a full-time position based on performance during the Internship and the then prevailing market conditions in January 2026 with a salary package of INR 11 LPA .
The breakup up of the  salary package is attached.
It will be a Virtual drive.
)

title: It's Your Time to Shine - Practice with FREE AI-powered Mock Interviews!
content:
Dear Students,

The placement season is here and it’s your time to shine!

If you're aiming for top MNCs and roles in Software Engineering, Management, or other General domains, this is your opportunity to prepare with confidence.

Not quite interview-ready yet ?  Don’t worry, we’ve got you covered.

Unstop is offering FREE AI-powered Mock Interviews to help you sharpen your skills and boost your confidence with real-time practice and feedback.

Here’s what you’ll get:

  • Role-specific interview simulations (SDE, Data Analyst, Product Manager, BD,various management roles, etc.)

  • Instant AI-generated feedback with personalized improvement tips

  • Real interview-style questions (HR, Technical, and Case-based)

This is real prep for real results - without the anxiety.

 Start your mock interview now

(There are three tabs (Tech, Management, and General) on the given link. Please click on the appropriate tab to start interview.)

Ace it before they place it.

Best regards,
Training & Placement Cell

title: Zopdev Summer of Code by ZopSmart Technology
content:
Kind attention: Aspirants of B.Tech All Branch Students and INTGT All Branch Students 2026 Batch, BCA, MCA, BSc 2026 Batch Students.
 
Please find below the details as received for Zopdev Summer of Code 2025:
 
We are pleased to invite you to share the Zopdev Summer of Code 2025. This initiative is designed to offer students a hands-on, real-world learning experience that complements their academic journey and prepares them for industry roles.

What students will gain:
  • Experience working on live, impactful projects
  • One-on-one mentorship from industry professionals
  • Exposure to modern engineering workflows
  • A stronger transition into job environments
Interested students can volunteer for Zopdev Summer of Code 2025.
 
Click on the link below to volunteer for the event.
https://app.joinsuperset.com//#/surveys/generic/5d1ba226-ae1f-492e-a3c5-9a8f5dc87bf1/submit
 
Click on the below link to register for the event at company registration link given below:
 
 https://unstop.com/hackathons/zopdev-summer-of-code-2025-zopdev-1501952 
 
(Apply by 5 PM, 23 June, 2025)

Note: Once registration is complete on both the given links, the company will send direct emails to the shortlisted students and guide them to move to the next steps of the participation. Please be attentive and participate in the event as per the directive email to be received from the ZopDev Summer of code. In case of any help, please do write to me.
 
Thanks & Regards
Vinod Kumar
Sr. Officer - T & P
JIIT, Noida

title: Amazon: Internships & Full-Time Roles for Batch 2026 Students - Amazon Portal Lin - Apply by EOD 19 June 2025
content:
Amazon: Internships & Full-Time Roles for Batch 2026 Students apply by 09 AM, 19 June 2025

 

BTech/Integrated MTech Batch 2026 Students

 

Amazon invites applications from students of Batch 2026 for Internship and Full-Time Opportunities.

 

At Amazon, your career journey will be shaped by you—offering opportunities to lead, innovate, and make real impact. You'll work on cutting-edge technology alongside global teams, with a shared mission to delight customers worldwide.

 

Whether through an internship or a full-time role, you’ll contribute to projects that touch the lives of millions.

 

Don’t miss this opportunity to begin your Amazon journey.

 Interested Students are requested to register at the Amazon Career Portal by EOD 19 June 2025   

 

Click here for Amazon Portal Jobs

 

All the Best!

Anita Marwaha

title: Flipkart Grid 7.0 - Batch  2026 - hiring challenge -SDEs Internships and Full-Time Roles - apply by 10 AM, 19 June 2025
content:
Kind Attn: Students of 2026 Graduating Batches

Flipkart GRiD is a flagship engineering campus challenge, recognised as India's largest Tech Case Competition. Curated for the best and the brightest engineering students across India, GRiD's legacy has been about more than just a competition - it's where talent meets innovation and entrepreneurship.

 GRiD 7.0, get a chance to leap into Flipkart's World of Maximisation, and explore networking and complex problem solving that is aimed towards some of the finest e-commerce challenges of today. Participants will present their solutions to Flipkart experts, with opportunities for grand prizes, recognition, and job offers.

Eligibility Criteria: This competition is open to students pursuing B.Tech., Integrated and M.Tech. All Branches of the 2026 Batch. No Active Backlogs.

Career Opportunities:

  • Winter Internship Interview Opportunity for 4th-year bachelor students or equivalent
  • Full-Time Interview Opportunity for 4th-year bachelor students or equivalent

Recognition:

  • Certificate of Merit or Achievement for Round 1, 2, and 3 Qualifiers
  • Top 50 recognised as India's most premium and hireable upcoming tech talent, discovered by GRiD over microsites and social media handles

Rewards and Prizes:

  • Flipkart EGVs worth INR 1,50,000 for the Teams at 1st Rank (2 Positions)
  • Flipkart EGVs worth INR 1,00,000 for the Teams at 2nd Rank (2 Positions)
  • Flipkart EGVs worth INR 50,000 for the Teams at 3rd Rank (2 Positions)

Program Registration:

Individuals will be required to register as solo participants. The same should be done within the mentioned deadline, ensuring that only accurate data is being submitted. Failure to do so will result in immediate disqualification.

Tracks & Roles:

There is only one track for GRiD 7.0 - Software Development. Based on the performance throughout the program, the candidates will be shortlisted for Software Development Engineer -1 (SDE-1) roles at Flipkart.

 

  Interested Students are requested to register at the link given below by 10 AM on 19 June 2025  

 

Click here to give consent for Flipkart Grid 7.0

All the Best!

Anita Marwaha

The shortlisted candidates will be hired as interns for 8-12 months at Stipend of INR 40,000 per month(full-time, in-office) and will be converted to full-time on the basis of their performance at a package of INR 21-27 LPA.

title: NXP - Virtual Tech Session 17 June 2025 - Register by 11 AM, 14 June 2025
content:
Kind Attention: B.Tech, Integrated, and M.Tech Students of ECE & VLSI of 2026 Batch

NXP Campus Connect  Program – Technical Webinar on Semiconductor & Embedded Systems

NXP Semiconductors, a global leader in secure connectivity solutions for embedded applications, is driving innovation in the automotive, industrial, IoT, and mobile sectors. With a strong emphasis on autonomous driving, AI, and cybersecurity, NXP provides engineers with the opportunity to engage in real-world challenges that shape the future of technology.

As part of its Campus Connect initiative, NXP India is organizing a technical webinar to engage with engineering students and faculty, offering insights into contemporary topics in semiconductor technology, design, and embedded electronic system design.

Webinar Details:

Date: 17th June 2025 (Tuesday)


Time: 5:00 PM

Topic: Radar Software Development Kit

Mode: Virtual (link will be shared later)

Action Required:


All ECE and VLSI students from the 2026  batch are requested to submit their consent to attend the session by 11:00 AM on 14th June 2025.

Click here to register for NXP Webinar on 17 June

Don’t miss this opportunity to learn from industry experts and explore cutting-edge innovations!

All the best!

Anita Marwaha

title: GoFr Summer of Code - Coding Challenge for 2026 Batch - Must register on the Company Registration Link by 09 June, 2025 - 10 AM
content:
Kind attention: Aspirants of GoFr Summer of Code Coding Challenge - B.Tech/M.Tech/INTGT All Branch Students of 2026 Batch

Company Registration link for  GoFr Summer of Code 2025 – Open Source, Mentorship & Certification Opportunity is live now for students.

The event is supported by ZopSmart Technologies. The company is a regular recruiter of Jaypee Universities students. Students who will perform during the whole program may be extended the Employment opportunities at suitable packages.

This is more than just another coding challenge — it’s a career-launching experience designed to prepare students for real-world engineering roles.

 Why Students Should Participate:

Real-world Open Source Contributions: Great for resumes, GitHub profiles, and interviews.
Official Certificate of Participation for all who complete the program.
Mentorship from industry experts and GoFr maintainers.
Hands-on Training Phase with curated learning resources.
Swags & Prizes for top contributors and active participants.
Experience in Golang, APIs, and System Design – all highly relevant for backend and system engineering roles.
Community Networking with developers and mentors from across the globe.

 Key Dates:
Training Phase: Starts 16th June 2025
Coding Phase: Begins 28th June 2025
Results & Awards: Announced 2nd August 2025

The program is open to all students with basic programming knowledge (C, C++, Java, Golang, Python, etc.) and a passion for learning. No prior experience with Golang or open-source is required — we’ll guide them every step of the way!

Why Should You Join:

  • Stand Out with Real-World Open Source Contributions: Open-source projects are gold on a resume. They show initiative, coding ability, teamwork, and real-world impact — exactly what employers are looking for.
  • Earn an Official GoFr Certificate: Every participant who completes the program will receive a Certificate of Participation – a formal recognition you can add to your resume, LinkedIn, and GitHub profile. Show the world you were part of building something meaningful!
  • Get Mentorship from Industry Experts: You’ll be paired with a mentor from the GoFr core team who will guide you, review your code, and help you learn the right practices for contributing to professional-grade projects.
  • Learn in a Structured Way; We’re not throwing you in cold! The training phase will equip you with everything you need — curated resources, tutorials, and hands-on guidance — so you can confidently make your first (or next!) open-source contributions.
  • Add Golang & System Design Experience to Your Portfolio: GoFr is a fast-growing Golang backend framework used in real-world systems. By working on it, you’ll gain valuable experience in Golang, distributed systems, APIs, and software architecture — all highly prized in the tech industry.
  • Network with a Global Community: Meet fellow coders, mentors, and open-source enthusiasts. Build connections that can lead to future collaborations, internships, or job referrals.
  • Get Swags + Win Prize: Eligible contributors will receive GoFr Swag Kits, and the top three contributors will walk away with exclusive prizes and public recognition!



 How to Register:

Students can register and learn more here: 

https://unstop.com/hackathons/gofr-summer-of-code-gofrdev-1488007

Must register on the Company Registration Link by 09 June, 2025 - 10 AM

 

We believe this initiative will be of great value to your students — both in terms of learning and career growth — and we would appreciate your support in sharing this opportunity across your campus.

Thanks & Regards

Vinod Kumar
Sr. Officer - T & P
JIIT, Noida

title: GoFr Summer of Code 2025 - Coding  Challenge
content:
Kind Attention: B.Tech/M.Tech/INTGT All Branch Students (CSE, IT, ECE, Biotechnology and other branches of M.Tech/INTGT) – 2026 Batch

Please find below the details as received from GoFr Dev.

We are excited to announce the GoFr Summer of Code 2025, a hands-on open-source program designed to help students build real-world skills in backend development using Golang.  

 Introducing: GoFr Summer of Code 2025

GoFr Summer of Code is an open-source mentorship initiative designed for students and early-career developers to contribute to GoFr, a fast-growing Golang backend framework used in real-world applications. This program aims to boost participants' practical development experience, enhance their portfolios, and offer recognition through certificates, swag, and prizes. 

This is more than just another coding challenge — it’s a career-launching experience designed to prepare students for real-world engineering roles.

 Why Students Should Participate:

  • Real-world Open Source Contributions: Great for resumes, GitHub profiles, and interviews.
  • Official Certificate of Participation for all who complete the program.
  • Mentorship from industry experts and GoFr maintainers.
  • Hands-on Training Phase with curated learning resources.
  • Swags & Prizes for top contributors and active participants.
  • Experience in Golang, APIs, and System Design – all highly relevant for backend and system engineering roles.
  • Community Networking with developers and mentors from across the globe.

 Key Dates:

  • Registration to be completed: Before 08 June, 2025
    (We shall share the registration link to the students who volunteer for this Mentorship cum Hackathon program.)
  • Training Phase: Starts 16th June 2025
  • Coding Phase: Begins 28th June 2025
  • Results & Awards: Announced 2nd August 2025

The program is open to all students with basic programming knowledge (C, C++, Java, Golang, Python, etc.) and a passion for learning. No prior experience with Golang or open-source is required — we’ll guide them every step of the way!

 

 How to Register:

We shall share the company registration link with the students after the registration process.

Click here to volunteer for the event.

We believe this initiative will be of great value to you — both in terms of learning and career growth.

 

 Thanks & Regards

Vinod Kumar

Sr. Officer - T & P

JIIT, Noida

title: NXP - Artificial Intelligence in Mobility (AIM) 2025 -  Must Register at NXP Portal link by 6 PM, 03 June 2025
content:
NXP - Artificial Intelligence in Mobility (AIM) 2025

It is an exciting platform for engineering students to dive into the world of AI in Mobility and Robotics.

Students design and create mobile robotics prototypes using cutting-edge technologies like AI/ML, object/sign recognition, sensors, motion detection, computer vision, and obstacle avoidance.

Students will participate in multiple challenges both in a simulation and a real-world environment.

In Grand Finale, teams need to compete in a real-world environment. Design and Develop:

  • Sensor processing software
  • Sign and object recognition software
  • Obstacle avoidance software
  • Self-driving robotics algorithm

 

Click to register for NXP AIM 2025 PORTAL

 

All the Best!

Anita Marwaha
